data: Company Details Home / Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. Engineering Consultant Open Position Company Description Pranjal Projects Pvt Ltd was originally founded as a partnership firm in 1980 by H.C. Bhatia and was incorporated as a private limited company in 2002. It is now promoted by H.C. Bhatia and his sons, Vikas and Deepak Bhatia. The company is an Indian infrastructure and fabrication firm specializing in structural steel solutions for a diverse range of industries. Established date While the company was founded as a partnership firm in 1980 , it was formally incorporated as Pranjal Projects Private Limited on May 13, 2002 . Bio and background Company profile: Pranjal Projects provides a range of services, including sheet metal fabrication, pre-engineered buildings (PEB), and heavy engineering fabrication. Key products and services: Structural steel solutions for infrastructure projects like steel bridges and railway stations. Fabricated components for earth-moving equipment and heavy machinery. Heavy engineering equipment, including boilers, pressure vessels, and storage tanks for industries such as oil, gas, and power. Various steel products like TMT bars, plates, and beams. Certification and technology: The company is an ISO-certified firm that uses advanced technology, such as robotic and laser-guided welding, and adheres to OHSAS safety practices. It is also an approved provider for railways and bridges by the Research Designs and Standards Organisation (RDSO).
